markdownRemark.excerpt: Unintended or unanticipated consequences is understood as a law of human action. The larger the scale of the action, the greater the likelihood and the greater…
markdownRemark.html:
Unintended or unanticipated consequences is understood as a law of human action. The larger the scale of the action, the greater the likelihood and the greater the impact of the unintended or unanticipated consequences.

But we can’t just do nothing. Inaction is an action in itself. 

You either live life, bruises, skinned knees and all, or you turn your back on it and start dying.
~ Pike, Star Trek, The Cage

frontmatter.title: Unintended Consequences
frontmatter.description: Shoule be understood as a law of human action.
